description: FlashDevelop offers first class support for ActionScript (2 and 3) and Haxe development. Great completion and code generation, projects compilation and debugging, plenty of project templates, SWF/SWC exploration etc. FlashDevelop is also a great web developer IDE with source-control support (svn, git, mercurial), tasks/todo, snippets, XML/HTML completion and zen-coding for HTML.
summary: Open source code editor for Actionscript, Haxe and more.
author: fdorg
